description: My place is close to all that East Village and Lower East Side have to offer. You’ll love my place because of the views, the light, the quietness (rare treat in the East Village!), the airiness, and it's so clean. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business folks as well.
name: Quiet Sunny Studio in the East Village
review:
The Studio is cozy, beautiful and very clear...Could not be in better neighborhood...East Village is magic and very cool.
Claudette is very friendly and always ready for anything. Communication was terrific nod very easy.
Super Recommended !!!
